thread.title: These are LinkedIn's most in-demand companies
thread.title_full: These are LinkedIn's most in-demand companies - seattlepi.com

author: Ebony C. Fleming
title: These are LinkedIn's most in-demand companies
text:
More than 300 million professionals use LinkedIn to network with individuals in their field, many with the hopes of landing a new or better job. Recently, the world's largest professional networking site compiled a list of its most InDemand companies .
They're the brands everyone knows, and offer the careers (and salaries) so many people are pursuing. The industries most people are flocking to are tech, Telecom, and media; professional services; and retail and consumer products, according to the site.
Of the 50 companies on the list, less than 25 percent have fewer than 5000 employees. And, not surprisingly, most of the InDemand companies are based in New York or California.
Check out the gallery to see LinkedIn's most InDemand companies and the key skills you'll need to get your foot in the door.
